title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.6 - Minimum payoff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.6 - Minimum payoff

State Regulations

Each association must in all cases of a pari-mutuel pool
distribute not less than $2.10 on each winning two-dollar wager. No part of any
minus pools resulting from such payments shall be charged against the State's
participation in the total pools or the breaks. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4215.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
